title: REESE’S Classic Doughnut
description: A doughnut filled with REESE’S Peanut Butter Kreme™, dipped in HERSHEY’S chocolate icing, topped with mini peanut butter chips and a drizzle of chocolate and REESE’S peanut butter sauce.

title: Original Filled Original Kreme
imgAlt: Picture of Original Filled Original Kreme
description: Original Filled, Original Kreme™ Doughnut:  Our iconic Original Glazed®  Doughnut filled with classic White Kreme™ and decorated with an icing drizzle.

title: Original Filled Chocolate Kreme
imgAlt: Picture of Original Filled Chocolate Kreme
description: Original Filled, Chocolate Kreme™ Doughnut:  Our iconic Original Glazed®  Doughnut filled with Chocolate Kreme™ and decorated with a chocolate icing drizzle.

title: Original Glazed
description: Look out for the Hot Light™! Our Hot Light signals something really special. When we turn the light on, it means that our delicious Original Glazed® Doughnuts are available right at that very moment! So when you see the Hot Light on, stop in and get some hot Original Glazed® doughnuts.

title: Chocolate Iced Glazed
description: Chocolate lovers take note! We take our Original Glazed® doughnut one simple, yet delicious, step further by hand-dipping it in smooth, delectable chocolate icing.

title: Chocolate Iced Glazed with Sprinkles
imgAlt: Picture of Chocolate Iced Glazed with Sprinkles
description: Our Original Glazed® ring is dipped in chocolate icing and then topped with colorful sprinkles.

title: OREO Cookies and KREME
imgAlt: Picture of OREO Cookies and KREME
description: Our OREO® Cookies and Kreme Doughnut is a fan favorite! Filled with OREO Cookies and Kreme filling, dipped in dark chocolate icing and topped with OREO cookie pieces. You don't want to miss this.

title: Chocolate Iced with KREME Filling
imgAlt: Picture of Chocolate Iced with KREME Filling
description: A favorite of many, this yummy variety is filled with our light and smooth KREME™ filling. It is then dipped in our classic chocolate icing to create a delectably balanced treat.

title: Cake Batter
description: We love celebrating birthdays every day with a scrumptious cake batter doughnut. Filled with cake batter KREME, topped with yellow icing and bright confetti sprinkles, this doughnut is perfect for any party.

title: Chocolate Iced Custard Filled
imgAlt: Picture of Chocolate Iced Custard Filled
description: This doughnut is filled with creamy custard and hand-dipped in rich chocolate icing. Yum!

title: Glazed Raspberry Filled
description: This scrumptious doughnut is glazed and then filled with a sweet and tangy balanced raspberry jelly.

title: Glazed Lemon Filled
description: Bursting with lemon filling and topped with our signature Original Glaze, our lemon filled doughnut is sure to brighten your taste buds.

title: Strawberry Iced with Sprinkles
imgAlt: Picture of Strawberry Iced with Sprinkles
description: Our Original Glazed® Doughnut is dipped in strawberry icing and topped with festive rainbow sprinkles.

title: Apple Fritter
description: Apple Fritters are a classic. Ours is bursting with cinnamon and apple flavor, all covered in glaze.

title: Chocolate Glazed Doughnut
description: Our classic Original Glazed® Doughnut covered in rich chocolate glaze.  *Available on Chocolate Glaze Fridays in participating locations.

title: Glazed with KREME Filling
imgAlt: Picture of Glazed with KREME Filling
description: This yeast raised shell is glazed and then filled with delicious KREME.

title: Chocolate Iced Cake
description: Our Traditional Cake doughnut is hand-dipped in decadent chocolate icing.

title: Chocolate Iced Raspberry Filled
imgAlt: Picture of Chocolate Iced Raspberry Filled
description: Filled with sweet raspberry jelly, this scrumptious doughnut is topped with chocolate icing and a delicate red swirl.

title: Glazed Chocolate Cake
description: If you love chocolate cake then you love this doughnut. It is rich, moist and full of chocolate flavor. We then top it off with our signature glaze.

title: Glazed Blueberry Cake
description: This classic cake doughnut is bursting with blueberry flavor and then glazed to create an irresistible flavor combination.

title: Cinnamon Apple Filled
description: Inspired by classic apple pie, this doughnut is filled with cinnamon apple compote. It then is tossed in a cinnamon sugar topping to incorporate the flavor throughout.

title: Cinnamon Bun
description: Who doesn’t love a cinnamon bun? Tempt your taste buds with our cinnamon dough topped with our signature glaze.

title: Cinnamon Sugar
description: Our classic ring is tossed in cinnamon sugar for a perfectly simple treat.

title: Glazed Sour Cream
description: This rich and moist cake doughnut is topped with Original Glaze, providing the perfect finishing touch to a scrumptious classic.

title: Traditional Cake
description: The classic cake doughnut is simple and a little less sweet than its fellow doughnuts. Moist and rich, sometimes simple is all you need.

title: Chocolate Iced Glazed Cruller
imgAlt: Picture of Chocolate Iced Glazed Cruller
description: We cut our cake into a cruller and send it sailing through the glaze waterfall. We then finish it into our decadent chocolate icing.

title: Cinnamon Twist
description: A heavenly twist to an old favorite - our yeast-raised doughnut is shaped by hand into a twist, then completely covered in cinnamon sugar!

title: Dulce De Leche
description: Dulce de leche originated south of the border - a rich and creamy caramel-flavored treat. Its deliciousness inspired our Dulce de Leche doughnut. Thick dulce de leche filling is inside; crunchy, granulated sugar coats the outside.

title: Glazed Cinnamon
description: There's something about cinnamon. It's reminiscent of Mom, cinnamon toast and good times at home. To recreate that feeling, try our Glazed Cinnamon doughnut - we've added just the right amount of cinnamon flavor to a yeast-raised doughnut, sent it sailing through our signature glaze waterfall and finish it off with a dusting of powered cinnamon sugar.

title: Glazed Cruller
description: Rich and moist, our cruller is an enticing twist on our classic cake doughnut. And, of course, it's finished off with our uniquely delicious signature glaze.

title: Maple Iced Glazed
description: Our classic Original Glazed® doughnut, dipped in maple flavored icing.

title: Mini Original Glazed Doughnuts
imgAlt: Picture of Mini Original Glazed Doughnuts
description: Same great taste and flavor as the full-sized Original Glazed® Doughnut, just a little smaller.

title: Mini Chocolate Iced Glazed
imgAlt: Picture of Mini Chocolate Iced Glazed
description: Same great taste and flavor as the full-sized Chocolate Iced Glazed doughnut, just a little smaller.

title: Mini Chocolate Iced with Sprinkles
imgAlt: Picture of Mini Chocolate Iced with Sprinkles
description: Same great taste and flavor as the full-sized Chocolate Iced with Sprinkles doughnut, just a little smaller.

title: Mini Strawberry Iced with Sprinkles
imgAlt: Picture of Mini Strawberry Iced with Sprinkles
description: Same great taste and flavor as the full-sized Strawberry Iced with Sprinkles Doughnut, just a little smaller.

title: New York Cheesecake
description: Our version of this popular dessert is filled with rich, creamy cheesecake filling, topped with cream cheese icing and sprinkled with crunchy graham.

title: Powdered Blueberry Filled
description: A yeast-raised doughnut shell jam-packed with blueberry filling and coated with a light dusting of powdered sugar.

title: Powdered Cake
description: Another classic - This rich and moist traditional cake is covered in powdered sugar. It is worth the mess!

title: Powdered Cinnamon Cake
description: Our traditional cake, tossed in powdered cinnamon.

title: Powdered Strawberry Filled
description: Full of flavor, this doughnut is jam-packed with strawberry filling and dusted in powdered sugar.

title: Powdered with Lemon Kreme
imgAlt: Picture of Powdered with Lemon Kreme
description: A powdered shell filled with tasty lemon kreme.

title: Powdered with Strawberry Kreme
imgAlt: Picture of Powdered with Strawberry Kreme
description: A powdered shell filled with sweet, strawberry kreme.

title: Strawberry Iced
description: The strawberry iced doughnut is a delicious treat and so pretty in pink.

title: Original Glazed Doughnut Holes
imgAlt: Picture of Original Glazed Doughnut Holes
description: We've taken our Original Glazed® Doughnuts and created tasty, on the go treats for sharing.

title: Glazed Cake Doughnut Holes
imgAlt: Picture of Glazed Cake Doughnut Holes
description: Glazed Cake Doughnut Holes. Perfect for sharing! (varies by location)

title: Glazed Blueberry Cake Doughnut Holes
imgAlt: Picture of Glazed Blueberry Cake Doughnut Holes
description: Glazed Blueberry Cake Doughnut Holes. Perfect for sharing! (varies by location)

title: Glazed Chocolate Cake Doughnut Holes
imgAlt: Picture of Glazed Chocolate Cake Doughnut Holes
description: Glazed Chocolate Cake Doughnut Holes. Perfect for sharing! (varies by location)
